mso-font-kerning:0pt">（执行<span lang="EN-US">shell </span>命令）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:

font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#091A00;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">相关函数<span lang="EN-US"> fork</span>，<span lang="EN-US">execve</span>，<span lang="EN-US">waitpid</span>，<span lang="EN-US">popen</span> 表头文件<span lang="EN-US">
#include<stdlib.h></span> 定义函数<span lang="EN-US"> int system(const char *
string);</span> 函数说明<span lang="EN-US"> system()</span>会调用<span lang="EN-US">fork()</span>产生子进程，由子进程来调用<span lang="EN-US">/bin/sh-c</span> <span lang="EN-US">string</span>来执行参数<span lang="EN-US">string</span>字符串所代表的命令，此命令执行完后随 即返回原调用的进程。在调用<span lang="EN-US">system()</span>期间<span lang="EN-US">SIGCHLD </span>信号会被暂时 搁置，<span lang="EN-US">SIGINT</span>和<span lang="EN-US">SIGQUIT </span>信号则会被忽略。 返回值 如果<span lang="EN-US">system()</span>在调用<span lang="EN-US">/bin/sh</span>时失败则返回<span lang="EN-US">127</span>，其他失败原因返回<span lang="EN-US">-</span> <span lang="EN-US">1</span>。若参数<span lang="EN-US">string</span>为空指针<span lang="EN-US">(NULL)</span>，则返回非零值。如果<span lang="EN-US">system()</span>调 用成功则最后会返回执行<span lang="EN-US">shell</span>命令后的返回值，但是此返回值也有 可能为<span lang="EN-US">system()</span>调用<span lang="EN-US">/bin/sh</span>失败所返回的<span lang="EN-US">127</span>，因此最好能再检查 <span lang="EN-US">errno </span>来确认执行成功。 附加说明 在编写具有<span lang="EN-US">SUID/SGID</span>权限的程序时请勿使用<span lang="EN-US">system()</span>，<span lang="EN-US">system()</span>会 继承环境变量，通过环境变量可能会造成系统安全的问题。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

mso-font-kerning:0pt">相关函数<span lang="EN-US"> pipe</span>，<span lang="EN-US">mkfifo</span>，<span lang="EN-US">pclose</span>，<span lang="EN-US">fork</span>，<span lang="EN-US">system</span>，<span lang="EN-US">fopen</span> 表头文件<span lang="EN-US"> #include<stdio.h></span> 定义函数<span lang="EN-US"> FILE * popen( const char * command,const char * type);</span> 函数说明<span lang="EN-US"> popen()</span>会调用<span lang="EN-US">fork()</span>产生子进程，然后从子进程中调用<span lang="EN-US">/bin/sh -c</span> 来执行参数<span lang="EN-US">command</span>的指令。参数<span lang="EN-US">type</span>可使用“<span lang="EN-US">r</span>”代表读取，“<span lang="EN-US">w</span>” 代表写入。依照此<span lang="EN-US">type</span>值，<span lang="EN-US">popen()</span>会建立管道连到子进程的标准输 出设备或标准输入设备，然后返回一个文件指针。随后进程便可利 用此文件指针来读取子进程的输出设备或是写入到子进程的标准输 入设备中。此外，所有使用文件指针<span lang="EN-US">(FILE*)</span>操作的函数也都可以使 用，除了<span lang="EN-US">fclose()</span>以外。 返回值
若成功则返回文件指针，否则返回<span lang="EN-US">NULL</span>，错误原因存于<span lang="EN-US">errno</span>中。 错误代码<span lang="EN-US"> EINVAL</span>参数<span lang="EN-US">type</span>不合法。 注意事项 在编写具<span lang="EN-US">SUID/SGID</span>权限的程序时请尽量避免使用<span lang="EN-US">popen()</span>，<span lang="EN-US">popen()</span> 会继承环境变量，通过环境变量可能会造成系统安全的问题。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Arial",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
